name: devon-scope
effect: Reveals invisble kecleon on the overworld.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A device by DEVON that signals any unseeable POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: A device by DEVON that signals any unseeable POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A scope that signals the presence of any unseeable POKéMON. It is made by the DEVON CORP.
